summary:
Innovative Senior Frontend Developer with 9+ years of experience specializing in modern web applications and enterprise-scale UI architectures. Expert in Angular ecosystem with a strong focus on performance optimization and user experience. Core competencies include:

• Technical Leadership: Led frontend architecture decisions and mentored development teams
• Angular Expertise: Advanced implementation of Angular (2+ through 16+) and its ecosystem
• State Management: Expert in NGXS/NgRx, RxJS, and complex state architectures
• Performance Optimization: Bundle optimization, lazy loading, and rendering performance
• UI/UX Development: Responsive design, accessibility (WCAG), and modern UI patterns
• Testing & Quality: E2E testing, unit testing, and continuous integration
• Component Architecture: Scalable and reusable component design patterns
• Modern Web: Progressive Web Apps (PWA), Server-Side Rendering (SSR)

Key Achievements:
• Reduced initial load time by 45% through advanced optimization techniques
• Improved application stability by 50% using state management
• Created reusable component library reducing development time by 40%
• Led frontend architecture for enterprise applications serving millions of users
